hero.name: Hussain Burhanuddin
hero.title: Software Engineer | AI & Machine Learning Developer
hero.summary: Versatile Software Engineer with experience in developing AI-powered applications using React, TypeScript, FastAPI, and Django. Proficient in building intelligent agents with CrewAI and n8n, and implementing Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) systems with LangChain. Skilled in training and deploying machine learning models and neural networks using scikit-learn and TensorFlow, and integrating them into scalable applications. Brings a well-rounded technical skill set across both application development and AI/ML domains.

responsibilities: Worked on multiple client-facing projects simultaneously in an agile, service-based environment.
Developed full-stack features using React, FastAPI, PostgreSQL, AWS, and OCR pipelines.
Designed microservices, optimized databases, implemented ETL workflows, and integrated 3rd-party APIs.
Collaborated cross-functionally with client engineering teams to deliver production-ready solutions.

projects.name: LunarScan – Security Scan & Vulnerability Analysis Platform
details: Built dashboard (React + FastAPI) and integrated Celery workers for parallel scans.
Implemented Stripe and delivered security reports generation microservice.

projects.name: Diversifi – Carrier Operations Software (Shipping & Billing Automation)
details: Developed PyTesseract OCR microservice for extracting shipment label data.
Created shipping reports automation (Playwright), FedEx/UPS/Deposco integrations.
Designed DynamoDB + PostgreSQL hybrid data architecture.

achievements: Built AI-driven tools using FastAPI, React, Flutter, Redux, PostgreSQL, and MongoDB.
Collaborated on data modeling, ERDs, and developing ETL pipelines for ML workflows.
Integrated ML models and intelligent agents using LangChain, OpenAI, n8n, and Redis.
Utilized Firebase, BigQuery, and GCP APIs for data pipelines and analytics.
Integrated Keepa API for supplier insights.
Completed a 6-month graduate training program covering SQL, Python (CS50), ML (ISLP), data warehousing, BI (Power BI), and data modeling.
Automated repetitive data validation tasks with Pandas and BigQuery.
Supported Pepsi data quality project for BI dashboards.
Maintained and optimized WordPress client websites.
Delivered workshops and training in Python, robotics, and automation.
Led the video production team for educational content.
Multi AI Agent Systems with CrewAI — DeepLearning.ai
Supervised Machine Learning: Regression & Classification — DeepLearning.ai
